" GLOBAL " is among regional (not federal) television stations with their 24-hour programming, broadcasting 24 hours in the Sarajevo region. The Saratov 24 network produces the largest number of television programmes on Saratov and Saratov province among all regional television stations broadcasting on the territory of Saratov.
